create procedure dbo.USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDITSAVE_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENTION ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @REPORTRECIPIENTID uniqueidentifier ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try if exists (select ID from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENTION where SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = @ID) if @REPORTRECIPIENTID is null delete USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENTION where SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = @ID else -- handle updating the data if the row already exists update dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENTION set REPORTRECIPIENTID = @REPORTRECIPIENTID, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE where SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = @ID else -- insert the row if it doesn't exist yet and the value for REPORTRECIPIENTID is not blank if @REPORTRECIPIENTID is not null Insert into USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENTION (SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID, REPORTRECIPIENTID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID) values (@ID, @REPORTRECIPIENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID)
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
